summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York, dated November 6-7, 2021, concerning a subject titled 'MV-3 and "Victim"'. It appears to be internal DOJ correspondence regarding case strategy or evidence, with an attached government letter on the same topic.
locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is internal DOJ email correspondence dated November 6-7, 2021.
The subject of the emails is 'MV-3 and "Victim"', indicating discussion of a minor victim (MV-3) in the Epstein case.
The correspondence includes an attached government letter on the same topic (Govit_Letter_re_MV-3_and_Victim_v3_adocx).
All correspondents appear to be Assistant United States Attorneys, though their names are redacted with (USANYS) identifiers.
The document originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York at 1 Saint Andrews Plaza.
